welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santander de Quilichao! This charming city is known for its rich indigenous culture, beautiful landscapes, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Mi Comía
restaurants.description: Restaurante Mi Comía is a seafood restaurant located in Santander de Quilichao.
restaurants.address: Carrera 10 # 6-49, santander de quilichao cauca, Cauca
